title: This Witch for Hire
description: A new omnibus with two of Kim Harrison's bestselling The Hollows series!Includes:* Dead Witch Walking* The Good, the Bad, and the UndeadBounty hunter and witch Rachel Morgan calls the Hollows, the menacing, magical section of Cincinnati, her home - as do all the supernatural beings spawned from the Angel Virus, the great plague that killed much of humanity....
author: Kim Harrison
